title: Portfolio Website
description: A sleek personal portfolio built with React and Tailwind CSS.

title: Weather App
description: Real-time weather updates using OpenWeather API and geolocation.

title: Task Manager
description: A productivity app with drag-and-drop task organization.

title: Blog Platform
description: Markdown-based blog with dynamic routing and content management.

title: E-commerce Store
description: A mock online store with cart functionality and Stripe integration.

title: Chat App
description: Real-time messaging app using Firebase and React.

title: Recipe Finder
description: Search for recipes using the Spoonacular API with filters and favorites.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Track workouts and progress with charts and calendar integration.

title: Music Player
description: A sleek music player with playlist support and audio controls.

title: Travel Journal
description: Log travel experiences with maps, photos, and notes.
